channel.title: How do i get it so i can have like 5000M gp in my bank?!
channel.description: please help me lol, i have been trying for the last [glow=red,2,300]2 hours[/glow] and haven't found [glow=red,2,300]aything[/glow] in either the client, nor anything else... please help :( Thanks :)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 23, 2006, 07:09:16 PM[/size][hr]lol 7 ppl reading it but no replys :( please help, i have seen it on other servers i have been to, they had like a max of 2000M-gp and i just cant figure it out :(:(:(:( please help!!!! ;)

item.title: How do i get it so i can have like 5000M gp in my bank?!

item.title: How do i get it so i can have like 5000M gp in my bank?!
item.dc:creator: @kramer4life kramer4life
item.description:
@kramer4life wrote:

Search

[code] playerItems[i] = item+1;
if ((playerItemsN[i] + amount) < maxItemAmount &&

(playerItemsN[i] + amount) > 0)[/code]

And replace it with
[code]playerItems[i] = item+1;
if ((playerItemsN[i] + amount) < maxItemAmount &&

(playerItemsN[i] + amount) > 2147000000)[/code]

You try to go 2148 and you get an error… Theres more numbers but Im using 2147 cause im to lazy to get the exact number…

Read full topic
